DOC.brief_summary: The One Drop Experts Program Type 2 Diabetes Self-Management Impact A1c trial 12-week long , prospective , intent-to-treat study aim evaluate impact One Drop app Experts program HbA1c level individual uncontrolled Type 2 diabetes . A secondary objective evaluate participant utilize Apple Watch combination One Drop app Experts program , ass whether group engage experience different impact compare participant utilized One Drop app Experts program .
DOC.brief_title: One Drop Experts Program Type 2 Diabetes Self-Management : Impact A1c
DOC.criteria: Selfreported Type 2 diabetes diagnosis Has change treatment regimen last 3 month HbA1c level â‰¥ 7.5 % selfreport verify lab test Motivated use daily diabetes selfmanagement coach program improve diabetes control Owns use iPhone compatible iOS operate system successfully download use smartphone application previously Current use smartphone application manage diabetes Currently participate diabetes selfmanagement education coach program Currently pregnant Does understand English History serious mental illness dementia Has severe diabetic complication severe diabetic retinopathy , chronic kidney disease ( stag 45 ) , severe diabetic neuropathy , diabetic foot ulcer infection
